attributes.action: Ban plastic bags in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Plastic bags are banned in South Africa,  Taiwan,Rwanda, India, Bangladesh, San Francisco & Mexico & more.. Usage is restricted in China, Italy, Australia.

The UK must do more. 
I would love to see the UK have a total ban or tax on all plastic bags given out by retailers.


Bring your own or pay the price, £ and environmentally.


Change is in the bag.

The UK must do more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
